N=int(raw_input())
H=[int(num) for num in raw_input().split()]

S=[0 for i in xrange(len(H))]
def populateS(i):
    num=1
    minVal=10**9
    while(num<=i):
        val = abs(H[i]-H[i-num])+S[i-num]
        if val<minVal:
            minVal=val
        num = num*2
    return minVal

for i in xrange(1,len(H)):
    S[i] = populateS(i)
print S[-1]
